title: Thank You Riot For All-Stars
body:
I just wanted to state my gratitude to Riot for All-Stars!

I watch a ton of LoL on twitch/lolesports  and i watch worlds and many many other events and player streams.  But hands down i have had the most fun watching All-Stars!  Seeing all my favorite players from all regions together in a relaxed atmosphere playing fun game variants was JUST AMAZING.

also, hope for a 1v1 mode ;D

PS.  Poro King is fun as hell ;D

replies.body:
Thank you for tuning in! We tried to level it up from previous years and take the feedback we got from Paris to heart. We want All-Stars to be a special event every year that feels different from Worlds or MSI, and I think we're closer than we've ever been to that goal.

Of all the modes and competitions, what was your favorite?
Tandem was hilarious. Same with One for All, 5v5 Assassins and Marksmen.
Probably the best replacement  for pick 10 will be Nemesis Mode. Knowing the pro players will choose the least expected champion for the enemy will be really good for entertainment.

Pick 10 mode was a disaster .. I hate the community for picking those comps and I facepalmed so hard when I saw the comps on the website. Maybe there is a better way to vote for these comps.. Maybe we can have the "least favourite mode" where the pros have to use the least popular champs ingame and we pair the pro with the champ.

All for One (they even made it into All for One Mirror cos of Huni's comments, which was awsome!!) was real fun.

I like the 1v1 introductions from Dash, might I mention that he looks smashing? Those hype me up alot. I like how you guys allowed the players to hear Dash's intro after the first day.

I wonder if a NURF mode would be warrented for the pros .. or would that be too horrible to watch.
It was worse last time, with almost a mirror match
One thing I would recommend is to bring in an Ultimate Bravery match, like what there was at IWCA. I loved that, and that would have been fun to see.

>
> Thank you for tuning in! We tried to level it up from previous years and take the feedback we got from Paris to heart. We want All-Stars to be a special event every year that feels different from Worlds or MSI, and I think we're closer than we've ever been to that goal.
> 
> Of all the modes and competitions, what was your favorite?

I am of the opinion that URF is a must have game mode at all future ASE.  I would also love to see Nemesis Draft!  But this year I loved the tandem mode, thought that was a great twist, well done.

I missed some (that I'm going to watch the vods for soon) including tandem but from what I saw 1v1s and basically all the fun modes were amazing! 10 Blitzcranks in one for all was absolutely hilarious and getting to see Faker DESTROY people on Rengar in assassins were big highlights. And of course that Westdoor 1v3 triple kill!!! :D All marksmen was less sweet than assassins but still a great time. I won't forget Nasus beating Quinn in 1v1 for a very long time. So many awesome moments.

I also want to mention the fire/ice theme because I really enjoyed that as well. The icons the players could use and especially the death animations were amazing and added a lot to the look and feel and fun of the event.

I would like to see pros play Poro King and Nemesis Draft. Anything that really gets pros playing stuff outside their norm and especially doing wacky things really makes me happy.

I liked the 1v1s and one for all the best. Though one for all was mostly because both teams picked blitzcrank. I also liked the one where they had two players playing together. The combo names were awesome and hearing them all laugh and clap for each other was too!

I like all the fun mode.

If i can suggest for next year all star, i would prefer less traditional 5v5 and more unusual stuff (3v3, dominion,...)
Also, a full random team fire/ice would be so much better (draft the player the first day for each team with max 3 of the same region/3 of the same role)

the 1v1 was also great, but maybe disable all marksmen for less mirror match/ already see matchup will be good too
